content: See removal/reset instructions if you do not know it. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/protect-your-thunderbird-passwords-primary-password#w_reset-your-primary-password-if-you-have-forgotten-it
creator: MattAuSupport

content: You're a genius! Before going away I had been tidying up my AB - I don't remember exactly what I did, but I do recall being annoyed that there was some connection with the Mac address book. Wish I could remember what I did, but making it so TB cannot access the Mac contacts seems to have solved the problem!
creator: caroline144
